settings.altdorf.name: Altdorf Endeavours
settings.altdorf.hint: Adds the endeavours included in Altdorf: Crown of the Empire.
settings.shelley.name: Shelley Endeavour
settings.shelley.hint: Adds the endeavour granted by Scealleah 'Shelley' Thorncobble (Patrons of the Old World I).
settings.farforian.name: Farforian Endeavour
settings.farforian.hint: Adds the endeavour granted by Farforian Whiteshore (Patrons of the Old World I).
settings.willhelm.name: Willhelm Endeavour
settings.willhelm.hint: Adds the endeavour granted by Willhelm von Vaulk (Patrons of the Old World II).
settings.angela.name: Angela Endeavour
settings.angela.hint: Adds the endeavour granted by Angela Hedame (Patrons of the Old World II).
settings.rosendorn.name: Rosendorn Endeavour
settings.rosendorn.hint: Adds the endeavour granted by Bryannah 'der Briekäse Rosendorn (Patrons of the Old World II).
settings.ulricsson.name: Ulricsson Endeavour
settings.ulricsson.hint: Adds the endeavour granted by Diel Ulricsson (Patrons of the Old World II).
WFRP4eEndeavours.NoToken: You must select at least one PC token
WFRP4eEndeavours.Endeavour.Label: Choose an endeavour:
WFRP4eEndeavours.Endeavour.Nothing: I will do nothing in particular.

@UUID[JournalEntry.gLDW6JBuoYuzCoya.JournalEntryPage.WQQk92GoGp7fRH89]{Animal Training}.

No Use for Visionaries.

Bear Witness.

WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Mark: You don't find anything useful about your mark.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Woodcraft: The poor shelter you create won't save your group from this inclement weather. You'll have to Test for @UUID[JournalEntry.NS3YGlJQxwTggjRX.JournalEntryPage.WCivInLZrqEtZzF4#exposure]{Exposure}.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Forage: You search and search, but find nothing.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Information: Nobody is willing to tell you anything.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Watch: Pretty sure nobody is behind those bushes...
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Patronage: You didn't choose a good play to patronize.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Penance: Your god isn't happy with your penance. Gain one @Condition[Fatigued] Condition. If fumbled, roll in the @Table[wrath] instead.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Null: Some of Wilhelm's Null Trait has rubbed off on you.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Visionaries: Rosendorn is struck by a terrible revelation about you which she absolutely refuses to share with you.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Witness: You don't learn anything new from Ulricsson.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.AnimalDemigryph: Your demigryph learned a new trick! You can add a @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.traits.V0naR1YbYCl0KIxp] Creature Trait.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.AnimalDog: Your dog learned a new trick! You can add a @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.traits.V0naR1YbYCl0KIxp] Creature Trait.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.AnimalHorse: Your horse learned a new trick! You can add a @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.traits.V0naR1YbYCl0KIxp] Creature Trait.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.AnimalPegasus: Your pegasus learned a new trick! You can add a @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.traits.V0naR1YbYCl0KIxp] Creature Trait.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.AnimalPigeon: Your pigeon learned a new trick! You can add a @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.traits.V0naR1YbYCl0KIxp] Creature Trait.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.DissentGossip: You are ready to start talking to the masses.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Mark: You discover something useful about your mark.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Woodcraft: You and your companions do not need to Test for Exposure due to inclement weather.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Forage: You found what you were searching for.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Watch: Nobody will surprise you in your watch!
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.CampRest: This comfortable camp allows you to reduce Fatigued conditions from a character.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.CampHeal: This comfortable camp allows you to heal a character.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.College: Studying in the College helps with your magic studies.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Patronage: You are a good patron of the arts.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Penance: Your god is moved by your penance. Removed 1 Sin Point, or 2 if you rolled +4 or more SL.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.MagicItem: You reveal some of the item's secrets.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Visionaries: Rosendorn catches a glimpse of your immediate future.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Witness: Ulricsson's lessons teach you more about Sigmar's life, but maybe it's heresy?
